entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
